issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
ORC timestamp writer stores the number of trailing zeros in 3 LSB bits. There is a bug in parsing nanosecond logic that returns incorrect value.

Input:
1999-01-01 00:00:00.999999999

Output: 
1999-01-01 00:00:00.463129087

The fix for this is parseNanos() should first right shift by 3 and then typecast to int.
fields.summary: Bug in ORC Timestamp reader returns wrong nanoseconds
